website_summaries.verdict: Simple, round brush design from a trusted name in hair salons uses mixture of boar bristles and nylon pins for best performance.
pros: Works great for styling with a hair dryer
Will handle all kinds of hair - curly, straight, or frizzy
Bristles reach the scalp, even if you have thick hair
cons: The paint on the wooden part of the brush may chip off easily

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item, the clear bag it came in looked dingy and had obviously been open already. The brush itself was used and full of hair!! So gross and absolutely unacceptable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My search is over!  Found it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used and purchased many round brushes in search of the perfect brush. This one is the best! On a whim I purchased it on Amazon Prime Day 2017. So glad I did! The brush has a rubber gripped handle which makes it comfortable to use. The bristles glide nicely through dry or damp hair. Doesn't make your hair staticky or break your hair. Leaves hair smooth, shiney and manageable, amazingly it also cuts down on the drying time. Love this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Volume holds!
customer_reviews.text: I went from medium length hair to short hair a couple months ago and could never get the volume I wanted with the short hair until I watched a YouTuber Dominque Sasche video where she recommended this brush. I wash my hair every other day and day 2 hair has just as much volume as day 1 hair. LOVE this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Strass

customer_reviews.title: Shiny, no frizz, no straightener needed
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this brush for the first time and I am INLOVE! I have coarse very thick hair that usually blow dries decently straight but has some poof and frizz so I still have to straighten it. I used this brush while blow drying my hair and it came out shiny with NO frizz so I didn’t have to use a straightener at all. I don’t normally review but I was thrilled with my results so it was warranted :)
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Best round brush I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing! Comfortable to use, and truly helps smooth my naturally curly hair when I dry it straight. I haven't had to use a straightener since I started using this brush along with an awesome haircare line I recently purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY FOUND A ROUND BRUSH FOR MY LONG HAIR
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I would say I am not disappointed at all. I purchase the largest round brush as my hair is waist length and fine, easily tangled. This brush never gets caught in my hair, never pulls any hair strands and easily blow dries my long hair without any problems. my hair comes out staight or loose curls, depending on how I blow dry it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price AND the seller is shady
customer_reviews.text: This is the hardest “natural” boar bristles I’ve ever used, and I’ve used a few. The brush is so hard it’s exceedingly difficult to use for blow drying hair. I ended up throwing away. NOT ONLY WAS THIS A BAD PURCHASE, but I’ve received at least three emails from the seller telling me they’d PAY ME if I’d REMOVE MY REVIEW!!! I guess we now know why the reviews look so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: cari49

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and this seller
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and this seller. As soon as my package said "delivered," the seller took the time to send me an email with instructions on how to make my brush last longer/ cleaning instructions. I love this level of customer service and care. The brush itself is amazing. I have thin, medium length hair that always seems to just fall flat when blow dried. With this brush and the right volumizing (we're going to make that a word today) product, I look like I came straight from the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hull

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the brush. It truly made a difference in the way my short bob fluffed. As described, drying time was reduced. Also the description allowed me to make the best choice for the size of the brush - I was very grateful for that information when making my selection. Also the brush is very light weight and easy to manage!!!

customer_reviews.title: Not for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t do many bad reviews, but this one is for all the girls who have long, thin, natural curly hair, like myself. This brush just got stuck in my hair and makes it frizzy. Very frizzy. The more I used it, the worst my hair looked. So....back to my old faithful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, crazy wavy hair. Not nice pretty waves...stick out like Pippi Longstocking hair. For years I have blown my hair dry, then used a flat iron. I noticed my stylist didn't need to use the flat iron on my hair. She used a brush like this one. As long as I don't let my hair air dry at all after my shower, I can use this brush to get nice straight hair. No more flat iron! Saves me a ton of time in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: JA KlingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great round brush.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this brush. I’ve never bought a round brush before but after cutting my bangs I knew I needed to get a brush that would keep my bangs looking polished when I fixed my own hair after leaving the salon. This brush is great. The barrel is a great size. Not too small for bangs and not so large that it’s unmanageable
customer_reviews.author: Desiree B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing! I have curly hair that I usually blow out most days. This brush makes the job so much easier! It makes my hair look shiny and healthier! Reduces the need to flat iron! Saves me time in the morning. I love the comfort of the handle! It did seem bigger than expected when I first got it but its fine. I'm planning to buy the smaller size now also! I never thought the type/quality of a brush made a difference but I'll never make that mistake again!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Fried

customer_reviews.title: Burned a chunk of hair off
customer_reviews.text: Never had a blowout brush do this. Maybe it's not vented enough but melted and ruined even my relatively thick Asian hair.
customer_reviews.author: kqchiang

customer_reviews.title: The Wonder Brush
customer_reviews.text: I am adding my 5-Stars along with the others. I have tried virtually every hair styling brush on the market and this brush stands alone. I gave it a test run and really like the feel. Good grip, very comfy to hold and like the way it glides thru my hair like butter, plus it delivers amazing shine and volume. It puts the WOW back in styling. My hair's new styling soulmate. Thank you Care Me:)
customer_reviews.author: Lori B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long. Broke when dropped
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased May 14. Now, a little more than two months later it broke this morning when I dropped it on the floor accidentally. I can't return it as the window on that closed on June 14!
customer_reviews.author: Boots Church

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic hair brushes! I’m a newbie to long hair styling having short hair my whole life and these brushes made recreating the great style my hairdresser gave me a breeze! I was actually shocked that I could do this. Before I got these I could never get my hair styled the way it was supposed to look. But, I don’t think it was much me as it was the great brushes. I got the sm, med and large brushes for different styles and am having a blast! Who knew a hair brush could bring so much joy?
customer_reviews.author: Snowcat60Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Broke in half at the handle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush about a year ago and had seldom used it. I normally style my hair with other tools and used this brush for the occasional wet to dry blow out. I must have used this brush less than 10 times since I bought it and yesterday the handle broke while I was blow drying my hair. Very poor construction! I couldn’t believe it...
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the Huge Size
customer_reviews.text: The site said this brush was for short hair. My beautician uses a brush like this and my hair looks great when she's through. I thought it would be about the size she uses, since it said it was for short hair. The minute I saw it, I was shocked at the size. I've found one about half that size I think will work. It's a great brush. If I had longer hair, I would have kept it, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: Buying a replacement two years later!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush!! It really does dry fast when you blow dry! It leaves my thin, fine hair feeling very soft and thick too. Great volume! I found that two years later, the bristles kind of wear out and fray out but that's just normal wear and tear, so I'm getting a new one. It also looks like I'll be getting the "new and improved" version :) cool!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna G

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this brush
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this brush. You may think it's just a hairbrush, how can it make a difference when drying your hair but it does, not all hairbrushes are made equal! I have fine hair but a lot of it and living in a humid climate my hair goes frizzy at a moments notice however with this brush I have noticed a definite improvement with the smoothness of my hair Thoroughly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Lamerton

customer_reviews.title: Good brush, but may take some practice.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this brush at first, but I've never been good at round brushes. Watched a few videos to learn better technique, and after much practice, I do like the brush! It does help tame my frizz and make nice, soft waves. You may need to practice a lot, though, if you are blow-dry challenged like me!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbergidget

customer_reviews.title: Change label
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush. Holds hair in place very well. The handle has a great grip. BUTTT They just need to put there logo on the bottom. The gap in the handle Hurts if you have carpal tunnel. I would’ve given 5 stars if the grip went all the way around .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It is super easy to handle and lives hair shiny and doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: With this brush I can blow my hair dry ten times faster. It is super easy to handle and lives hair shiny and doesn't make knots.
customer_reviews.author: 1Jul7

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again for the price & quality
customer_reviews.text: It worked well... easy to hold, did the job - but not any better than a drugstore purchase. And then after just over 6 months of use, the handle snapped mid-blowout... had to finish the job with my old backup from the drugstore (and saw no difference). Wouldn’t buy again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allison J. Gauer

customer_reviews.title: Blow dry brush boar bristles
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush the bristles are strong and hard so when I dry my hair it grabs it and does not let hair fall off brush. would purchase again. Next time I will purchase the med. size too.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for drying, but too large for short hair.
customer_reviews.text: This brush was supposed to be for short hair. It is much larger around than I was expecting. My stylist uses one like this on my hair, but she's a professional; I have a hard time twirling it enough to make it work well on my short hair. It is a nice stiffness to brush through my thick hair after it is dry though.
customer_reviews.author: JaDe

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would post a review on a hairbrush but this brush is great. I have very thick hair that tends to frizz. I read online that using a boar brush when drying hair helps reduce frizz. Using this brush did seem to produce smooth hair but the best part is that it didn't get stuck in my thick hair like previous brushes have! It was easy to pull through my hair and felt comfortable to use. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love my 1.3 round brush. Its dries my hair super fast on less heat. It straightens my wavy hair easily. The size works great with my medium length bob. It is also just right for my thin hair. However, thing I really love is the handle! Most round brushes are hard for me to grip, but this one's surface doesn't slide. It's easy to hold. All in all my favorite brush of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Baboonlouie

customer_reviews.title: A Great Brush at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This brush works and feel like one 3x its price. Good weight in the hand and the grip is excellent. The boiar hairs fell great when brushing hair. Blow drying is fast. Good quality (I've sent others back).
customer_reviews.author: Eve Benington

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: lOVE HOW FAST MY HAIR DRIES, TOTALLY LOVE THE SHINE OF MY HAIR USING THIS BRUSH - I have now told everyone about it. I thought when I saw it, I bought the medium size, that it was going to be way too big for my short hair. It works fine although I've also now ordered the smallest one to see what the difference is. I am just delighted that something actually lived up to what it was advertised to do/be!
customer_reviews.author: qcarla

customer_reviews.title: Ok But Not Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay tool. I prefer my Conair brushes over this. Had to try as it had good reviews and is supposed to be "the best" bristles. I prefer the feel of the other and the drying abilities isn't so great as to warrant a change. I'll keep, but won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: So it's not life changing or anything, but this is a great brush for the price. I have A LOT of thin, wavy hair and while it's easy to straighten, I have always struggled with a brush that can add body. Well, this brush definitely does that. However I feel like my hair has been teased after I use it, making me think that someone with super thick hair might not like this brush so much. But who knows, look at the other reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality brush
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife after she saw a review for it online. She loves it! Nice grip on the handle. Combination boar bristles and nylon bristles really grab her hair. Nice size barrel for blow drying her hair. And she likes the rose gold color. Great product and shipping was really quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still getting the hang of using it
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to using stuff like this so it’s a little awkward. My hair stylist uses one of these and it makes my hair so straight. Straight for days!! Obviously trying at home is different but when I have used it it has helped making my hair not so frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Katyface

customer_reviews.title: great brush
customer_reviews.text: I love the presentation of this brush. It is pretty and I like the color. The brush is easy to hold. It is not too big or too small. Easy to use to round hair while drying. Easily maintains my hair while blow drying and adds fluffy volume.
customer_reviews.author: s_nlbauer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair and i was worried I could damage my it by using a hair brush with such strong bristles. Couldn't be more mistaken. I love this brush. I even use it to style my dry hair without using a blow dryer cuz the grip is amazing (I have small hands). Another thing I love is the customer experience, the company send you info about how to maintain your product in optimal conditions and tips on how to blow dry your hair.
customer_reviews.author: K MOSS

customer_reviews.title: great brush
customer_reviews.text: Pondered long and hard about these brushes but wanted some boar bristle brushes rather than just synthetic. These are great. Was unsure of the size but the description accurately states the barrel size as well as the size including the bristles. You have to look for the descriptions but they are there. The answers to a couple of the questions also states the sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush - and have both sizes! It styles my hair, makes it shiny - almost as good as a salon blow out & I’m not that great with hair...Buy the brush!
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Bigs the shine back
customer_reviews.text: This is taking over my other Brush that I finally realized was doing damage to my hair. My hair is so fine and sensitive to heat, bristles, etc. I had to find something to use that was less damaging. Next time, I'll get a small size.
customer_reviews.author: ms. Pants

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: This does the job I wanted I wanted it to do. It makes my hair straight with a slight under flip. I can't ask for more. And it has kind of pretty coloring; that was not something I was searching for. It's all about getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: JoHarring0604

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: dried my hair for the first time over using a round brush (this brush) and it was very easy to use as someone who does not have much experience.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! My hair has never looked better. I get lots of shine and it seems to dry my hair much faster than any other brush I have owned. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ashton-Cheewah

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It makes it so easy and fast to dry my hair; I am finished quickly and I have lots of volume in my fine hair. I like the mixture of nylon and boar bristles and it works well on my medium length hair. I would certainly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: photobug

customer_reviews.title: Not really for short hair
customer_reviews.text: The title of this brush said for short hair. The barrel is a lit large for my short hair. If you’re looking for that, this 1.3” barrel is a little big. Maybe try for 1 inch or smaller. Also, I found that the brush left my hair a little frizzy looking. It didn’t smooth it out too good. The brush is easy to hold/grip and it does allow for fast drying. It was packaged in a padded envelope so some of the bristles arrived bent.
customer_reviews.author: C&M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t snag or break hair
customer_reviews.text: This is my first blow dry hair brush and I am super happy with it. It does not snag and break loose strands! Easy to hold, grip, and maneuver. Nice big wave since I purchased the largest one. I was worried about the pins but it is definitely helpful to keep hair on brush while you blow out.
customer_reviews.author: CARLA VARGAS

customer_reviews.title: Quick drying
customer_reviews.text: The manager of my favorite salon recommended this brush so I gave it a try. I think the boar bristles are much better for my hair than the last brush I was using. It dries my hair quickly (though I still can’t get my blow dry to look as good as at the salon!)
customer_reviews.author: KCassey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sizes and love them both! Ceramic and Boar Bristols are wonderful! I needed a new brush to blow dry my thick curly hair and these 2 brushes are great! Plus I the price is right! Get this brush! You will love them too!!!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia nathan

customer_reviews.title: Wow..great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love my brushes. I was so impressed with your product, that I am planning to show my stylist this product. I had a favorite brush I had for years and could not find a quality replacement. I finally found it with you....thank you so very much!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy and snags hair!
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT like this brush. The tips are definitely unfinished and scratch your scalp, and it snags my hair in the barrel... not sure how, as I have thin, straight hair... I’ve not used it as a blowout brush, but I’d wanted to be able to have it be my go-to.... will probably only use this (or contemplate using) the maybe three times a year I do a proper blowout.. A horrible everyday brush.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lerch

customer_reviews.title: Best round brush with one little issue
customer_reviews.text: This is the best round brush I have ever used for blow drying my hair. The only thing that keeps me from giving it five stars is that the end of this brush gets very hot from the dryer and it’s easy to burn your neck or face with it. If you’re careful, it’s still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody A

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hairbrush after seeing that my hairdresser always used a similar one that made my hair smooth and full of volume. I was not disappointed! The brush is of excellent quality and is easy to use. It gives my hair more shine by leaving it smoother than my usual blowdry brush and the volume it gives is amazing. Very happy I bought this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L H

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this round brush. It's the perfect size for my short Bob and the bristles feel so good on my thin fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: postal lady

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t catch and rip my hair out.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship for the price, it will be my go-to brush for styling my short hair. The handle seam doesn’t catch my hair thus I don’t lose any unnecessarily. The combination of the two bristle types keeps my hair in place for a smooth blow dry.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Better for thicker hair
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are somewhat rough. And your hair gets caught in the crevice where the handle meets the round barrel! Ouch... It does a good job smoothing the hair, but after using it for 2 months I have found the bristles are just a little to rough for my fine hair. If you have thicker hair it actually would be perfect!.
customer_reviews.author: Lauree

customer_reviews.title: Nice big full brush - great for my thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is of great quality. I had an issue with the 1 click app and my order got duplicated in error, but I loved the brush so much I gifted the other one to my daughter. I love that it's big and helps me get the control I need when blow drying my thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've used this several times blowdrying fine hair that's just above shoulder length. It does what it's supposed to do. Feels like I get a little static when I use this brush though. If anyone knows how to fix that, tell me pls!
customer_reviews.author: fabricsnob

customer_reviews.title: Ive had better
customer_reviews.text: Its not the best, but it's not the worst either. I think you should just spend a little more money and get a brush that is more worth the price. I upgraded after 2 weeks of having this.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McCall

customer_reviews.title: Best hair brush
customer_reviews.text: I have thick course long curly hair. This brush is the best. Leaves my hair shiny. Drying time amazing. Only 15 min. Boom. It’s dry. Looking so nice no longer have to flat iron
customer_reviews.author: ddenice

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure some people like it, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite brush. Bristles are a bit too sharp for me and the grippy handle gets caught in my hair. I’m sure some find it easy to use but not a good fit for my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush
customer_reviews.text: Much better brush than some expensive salon brands I’ve purchased before. Easy to control my chin length hair when drying with my Dyson dryer. Doesn’t tangle my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: It's a good price and it feels good too
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush a lot a really lot I'm going to buy the smaller size as well since I just got my hair cut into a cute little Bob so this brushes too big for the sides, but not the front.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could get so excited about a hairbrush. This product is fantastic. Not only does it do a great job styling my hair, but I no longer have to use my straightening iron - which makes for healthier hair. And It is so reasonably priced. Hands-down, my best pandemic purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MSozio

customer_reviews.title: slides through your hair easily with little hair loss or damage
customer_reviews.text: Works well, slides through your hair easily with little hair loss or damage. Better than any other round brush I had previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Born shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great hair grip, little painful in on my hand
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush. The handle does start to hurt my hand after a few minutes and it is bigger than I expected, but that’s my fault for not paying attention to the detail of the size. Brush does a good job of gripping my hair while blow drying
customer_reviews.author: Sam HiTech

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Brush is cumbersome and clunky. The bristles are very short , so I feel that they don't really grab my hair well. Additionally, the handle is covered in a rubber material that tends to pull your hair if your hair touches it (which it constantly does). I end up losing lots of hair strands when blow drying with this brush. I originally bought it because it claimed to help with frizz. It doesn't even do that. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Morales

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for smoothing, leaves hair soft and shiny. My only complaint is the handle broke off after only a few months of use. I love the brush so I did purchase another one. But that is definitely a design flaw that needs attention
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Your Hair Feeling Soft, Feeling Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying several blow drying techniques with this brush, but it still leaves my hair looking healthy, and does cut down on the drying time. I really like it so far. I just need to get my technique down.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: This brush is THE Best, hands down, thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is THE Best, hands down, thumbs up. I have straight, fine hair cut into a bob and this brush is perfect for wet or dry hair. The bristles feel SOOOO good! And the price is reasonable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette F

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my blow-drying round hairbrush! It is lightweight with a sure grip handle (important for arthritic hands). The boar bristles treat my hair gently. Drying and styling time is cut considerably. Good quality and prompt shipping. I can recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Affie mom

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: The curling hairbrush is perfect. Right size and the bristles make the blow drying go quickly. I was looking for a light brush with soft bristles. Very satisfied and the shipping was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: j.taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush for blow drying or just brushing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hairbrush for quite awhile know. Works great! Doesn't snag my wet hair, which I was shocked about. I absolutely love this brush. I use it even when I'm not blow drying my hair.
customer_reviews.author: louise miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A round brush that can straighten my curly course hair to be straight, and full of volume! I am very happy with my purchase because I normally would have to use a flat iron after blowing drying my hair straight (which would seriously deaden my ends and make my hair perpetually dry) and now I don't have to anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Sapphirelily

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but I have to on this brush. I have had my old brush for many years and thought it was doing the job...until I decided to try this brush. I had heard that Dominique was using this brush so I bought it and it has changed my life. Really. It will leave your hair beautiful. I especially like the grip! You won't regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ella O.

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brush, especially for long hair like mine. It doesn't allow tge hair to get tangled. It is no heavy and it has a nice ergonomic handle. Best brush I ever had so far. Great value, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Golding

customer_reviews.title: The best brush ever
customer_reviews.text: The best brush ever! My hair is really thick and course. After I blow dry with this brush it doesnt leave as frizzy as it was and I use it to straighten my hair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Faster and shinier
customer_reviews.text: You would think a brush does not make that much difference...I didn’t.. but it helps blow drying faster and it looks shiny as it advertised.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.U

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this along with the "ghd round ceramic brush", but this one seems cheap and also doesn't feel as sturdy. Just with one try I found some bristles fall off. So immediately returned it back. The quality also feels a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: travelofoodie

customer_reviews.title: A winner purchase
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this brush. The bristles are soft and your hair does not tangle at all. It gives a nice blow out. I have chin length hair that is thin and fine, with layers. I have more volume using this brush. I am happy with how this brush works for me.
customer_reviews.author: GoddessGal

customer_reviews.title: Soft, smooth hair
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this brush!!! My color-treated hair blow dries so smooth now instead of frizz city.
customer_reviews.author: the kool kid

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I have short, fine hair and this brush is amazing. It made a real difference in being able to style my hair. My previous round brush bristles would not hold my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cathee

customer_reviews.title: Good but bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: I replaced this brush with one I purchased from Wal-Mart that was old. This brush is nice, but every time I use it I found some of the boar bristles on my counter and floor. I'm afraid it will not last as long as the brush I had before.
customer_reviews.author: tgoday

customer_reviews.title: Boar Bristles Make A Difference
customer_reviews.text: I received the brush a week ago and have used it several times. I really like the way the bristles grab my hair which allows me to style my hair better than previous brushes. The handle is comfortable and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy from another brand
customer_reviews.text: I've had the brush for a few days already and have used it everyday, but the bristles keep falling out. Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: AKG

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Handle is comfortable to hold and use. Hair drys quickly, so this helps with less heat used on hair. I feel like my hair has less frizz and is smoother.
customer_reviews.author: GKB

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with the results however the brush is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush arrived intact in a clean, attractive wrapping. I used it to help blow dry and straighten my hair. I'm satisfied with the results however the brush is a bit difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!  Finally found a quality brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Makes my blowout look amazing and shiny!! Doesn't pull my hair out. Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, coarse hair, and bought this brush based off of the reviews... when I first used it a month or so ago and until now the bristles would fall out..if you can get past the bristle issue.. then this brush would be for you otherwise...it does a decent job. Not the best brush I've had to be honest.. I was hoping for better performance...
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for drying, styling
customer_reviews.text: Just got a shorter layered cut and the medium brush makes it so easy to dry and style. I also use the bigger size brush to dry the bottom layer in back. I use a different brush for comb out after drying.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin, fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brush! It's the perfect size for my short style, and it has the perfect amount of grip for my fine, thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this brush! Perfect size and easy to hold! So far my hair has not gotten tangled like other round brushes :)
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Brush
customer_reviews.text: I love my new hair brush! I have arthritis in my hands and the handle on this brush is easy to hold while blow drying my hair. My hair is thin so I appreciate the boars hair which pulls less on my hair and allows me to still get some lift in my hair style. I also love that the brush is one solid piece so no hair gets caught in any seams. Thank you for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: gerard murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I almost wish it would be heavier because I don't like how light weight it is... Having said that, it has a great hold and it does help me dry my hair faster
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Two different measurements posted - I saw the 33mm measurement ...
customer_reviews.text: Two different measurements posted - I saw the 33mm measurement but after receiving it, I read in another spot that it is 2" not 1.3. That little bit extra makes the brush too big for me. BTW, I've had boars head brushes in the past and none shed bristles the way this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Very nice brush. When I blow dry my hair this works like a charm. It only takes minutes now when I use my L’ange blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Pippy

customer_reviews.title: Good for my medium length, thick hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not good at blowouts but I like this brush! It glides through my hair and leaves it noticeably less frizzy and with more volume. One thing, the top of it gets very hot and I burnt myself a little bit, but that can be expected when you’re placing a hot hair dryer directly on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: Love that it grabs hair very securely to enable you to pull it and yet hair does not get tangled as you repeat a pull and rewind technique on the same section of hair . This allows for a very smooth look that I have been unable to achieve with other brushes
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: This brush was just OK, the bristles were really ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush was just OK, the bristles were really hard. Probably not suppose to mention other brands but next time I'll go with a Chi, more money but you'll have it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter's gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Granddaughter who has very long hair and she was delighted to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Detangles my hair very well, doesn't pull. Love this brush!
customer_reviews.author: Blue

product_meta.title: Blow Dry Round Volume Brush (2" Large Barrel) with Natural Boar Bristles for Blow-drying, Straightening Back Long Thick Hair, Straight or Big Curls
feature_bullets: ► 【Natural Boar Bristles For Shiny Hair】–> Our pure boar bristles distribute natural hair sebum oils as a conditioner resulting in shiny smooth hair. [IMPROVED] Added ball tips on nylon pins are gentle to the scalp and do not pull or snag the hair managing the coarse or thick hair.

► 【2” for Straightening Thick or Back Length Hair】–> 👉CHECK THE IMAGE OF "SIZE" BEFORE ORDERING. The overall size of 2"=53 mm (diameter of the Core only) is 3.3” if adding the length of bristles. Best for Straightening or Volumizing Full or Thick Hair At-Back Length. Contact us if you don’t know which size to choose from. If you have thin or fine hair, check our wooden round brushes 👉 https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Z8VHRLT

► 【Cut Your Blow-dry Time In Half】–> Vented Ceramic Barrel / Core allows up to 50% more airflow from a blow dryer and evenly distributes the heat to make hair dry quickly and straighten out. Boar bristles lift hair at right roots and add shine & volume.

►【Ions-infused Bristles For Frizz-Free Hair】-> Boar Bristles hold in moisture to reduce frizz & brittleness and to polish finish. Straightening, Curling, Blow-drying All Hair Types - Normal or Thick, Straight, Wavy or Curled Hair.
► 【Salon Styling Blowout Guaranteed】-> 👍Be Ready to get Compliments from your co-workers, friends, family your stylish hair, which gives you the Confidence – You know your hair looks so good!
